languages.text: "Так что не лезь лучше, а то и тебя приложим. А вы, святой отец, того — отвернитесь что ли, пока мы тут все порешаем!"
"You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"
languages.original_text: "Так что не лезь лучше, а то и тебя приложим. А вы, святой отец, того — отвернитесь что ли, пока мы тут все порешаем!"

traits.locale_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Father — you can look away or something while we handle this!"
"You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Father — you can look away or something while we handle this!"
"You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"
"You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"
"You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

languages.text: 「それ以上首を突っ込んだらあんたもただじゃおかないぞ。あと、そこの司祭―お前は黙って横で見てろ！」
languages.original_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

traits.locale_text: 「それ以上首を突っ込んだらあんたもただじゃおかないぞ。あと、そこの司祭―お前は黙って横で見てろ！」

languages.text: “你最好别掺和进来，否则我们把你也抓起来。还有你，牧师！我们处理这件事情的时候，你可以把头转开，或着怎么都行！”
languages.original_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

traits.locale_text: “你最好别掺和进来，否则我们把你也抓起来。还有你，牧师！我们处理这件事情的时候，你可以把头转开，或着怎么都行！”

languages.text: «Tú mejor no te metas, porque saldrás {mf|escaldado|escaldada} también. Y lo mismo le digo, reverendo. ¡Usted mire a otro lado mientras nos encargamos de esto!».
languages.original_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

traits.locale_text: «Tú mejor no te metas, porque saldrás {mf|escaldado|escaldada} también. Y lo mismo le digo, reverendo. ¡Usted mire a otro lado mientras nos encargamos de esto!».

languages.text: « Vous feriez mieux de vous mêler de vos affaires si vous voulez pas qu'on s'occupe de votre cas ensuite. Et vous, révérend : vous avez qu'à détourner le regard, si vous êtes pas content ! »
languages.original_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous feriez mieux de vous mêler de vos affaires si vous voulez pas qu'on s'occupe de votre cas ensuite. Et vous, révérend : vous avez qu'à détourner le regard, si vous êtes pas content ! »

languages.text: "Ihr haltet Euch besser raus, sonst holen wir Euch auch. Und Ihr, Reverend – Ihr könnt wegsehen oder sonst was tun, während wir das hier regeln!"
languages.original_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr haltet Euch besser raus, sonst holen wir Euch auch. Und Ihr, Reverend – Ihr könnt wegsehen oder sonst was tun, während wir das hier regeln!"

languages.text: "Bu meseleden uzak dursan iyi edersin yoksa senin de kellen gider. Sana gelince Muhterem, biz şu işi çözerken başını çevireceksin artık!"
languages.original_text: "You better stay out of this, or we'll get you too. And you, Reverend — you can look away or whatever while we handle this!"

traits.locale_text: "Sen bu meseleden uzak dursan iyi edersin yoksa senin de kellen gider. Muhterem, biz bu işin icabına bakarken sen de diğer tarafa bakabilirsin!"
